channel.title: **point based**?, F2p land only and Wilderness, Would you play?
channel.description:
Im sure that Iam going to put a server online for the community to play.
point based? Free to play wilderness and land. 99 max stat. still will have p2p skilling.
Would you play? these are already set in stone foundation for the server, and would liek to grow from this foundation.
im sick of all the slow grinding and gay rules other servers have. At this rate i believe it will be slow enough to keep a stable pk scene, yet still fast enough to enjoy rewards.
Coming soon!

item.title: **point based**?, F2p land only and Wilderness, Would you play?

So walden you’re paying xEnt to code a server for you, do you ever think anyone wants to play a server with you as the owner, Walden?
[/quote]
Lmao, where did this even come from.[/quote]

Shut up Matt, noone cares about your opinions, even people from your server call you a retard haha.

item.title: **point based**?, F2p land only and Wilderness, Would you play?
item.dc:creator: @xEnt xEnt
item.description:
@xEnt wrote:

I have recently been contracted to develop an upcoming server. probably about a month away. progress is coming along well. the server goals are nice and it looks like administration will be in good hands. It will be a medium xp rate p2p server with a large emphasis on quality of life tweaks. I’ll release more details soon enough!

item.title: **point based**?, F2p land only and Wilderness, Would you play?
item.dc:creator: @gawdz666 gawdz666
item.description:
@gawdz666 wrote:

Vibes:

You guys can believe something when you see it. You here at moparscape will be the first to know about it. I know everyone has got their watchful eye on this now. Just stay patient and with that you will see greatness. Something in the future for the future -vibes

Oh i believe in a point’s based server. I was the first one to create it after stork took his offline. But asking for collabs from people especially xEnt just isn’t a realistic idea. I would be down for a points based server with exceptions and the right server base. Just all needs to be done right.

item.title: **point based**?, F2p land only and Wilderness, Would you play?
item.dc:creator: @gawdz666 gawdz666
item.description:
@gawdz666 wrote:

[quote=“Vibes, post:17, topic:552274”][quote author=xEnt link=topic=671191.msg4491492#msg4491492 date=1438303469]
the problem is, point based servers are instantly known for massive EXP rate servers with skills not even really being important (stork pk clones). how about a regular type of server, 4-6x but point based. still takes awhile to train, still requires people to skill, just gives that flexibility of changing your combat stats around.
[/quote]
Sounds good xent, lets do this. I’ve pmed you sir.[/quote]

Woah hold up you thin xEnt is going to be apart of a project?

Read full topic

item.title: **point based**?, F2p land only and Wilderness, Would you play?
item.dc:creator: @l0w_archer l0w archer
item.description:
@l0w_archer wrote:

Personally i don’t like points based servers, But i’m also sick of the same 2 month servers, No developing team who have any idea about anything… i want RSC but a 2015 version… new spells, new weapons that actually have some thought into it, New npcs, areas and prayer levels… It’s certainly possible as there’s people showing what they can do on these forums… i would love to play 2015 Rsc update the shit out of it please! lol

Read full topic

item.title: **point based**?, F2p land only and Wilderness, Would you play?
item.dc:creator: @Jauro Jauro
item.description:
@Jauro wrote:

Vibes:

I think beyondRSC looks dope… I think Im going to Run it… Pointed based server looks like wicked fun.

Beyondrsc was great pk server, but from what i remember the source had some bugs on it…

point based server, with f2p/p2p switches, godmage nerfed as hell, so it dont hit ridiculous amounts like 25 etc… max hits 16’ish and so on… and add something NEW… not just a blank stork replica, we seen 50 of them, and not a beyondrsc/kingpk replica which is always the same… and one of the most important things these days, advertise it well. not many rsc players ( that there’s left) check’s mopar.

Read full topic

item.title: **point based**?, F2p land only and Wilderness, Would you play?
item.dc:creator: @KizL KizL
item.description:
@KizL wrote:

Mr derp has got it IMO. That’s what everyone wants. RSC then rsc Custom2P. Cause everyone loves f2p pking but p2p needs fixing. Add HP spells and drain spells. New armour new weapons. Keep it 99s and x10 combat x3 skills. All skills have batch like wow not just 1 extra after 10 lvls… Fuck that.

~K!zL

Read full topic

Rodgerwilco:

make a rsc house with rsc items and then have a rsc computer that you play rsc on… which players learn they are playing real life on, so you are playing rsc while it’s playing you.

This is genuinely awesome!

@op - Im kind of skeptical about points.

item.title: **point based**?, F2p land only and Wilderness, Would you play?
item.dc:creator: @Mr_derp Mr derp
item.description:
@Mr_derp wrote:

Doesnt matter WHAT it is…but you have to do SOMETHING…there has to be a catch, a reason to play your server and not the ones currently out

That is why i said a separate area for custom content maybe? Any server has this or that to make it different then the rest…

Read full topic
item.source: **point based**?, F2p land only and Wilderness, Would you play?

item.title: **point based**?, F2p land only and Wilderness, Would you play?
item.dc:creator: @Vibes Vibes
item.description:
@Vibes wrote:

right… you do have some valid points here. But my main focus is to keep the pking as basic and original like real RSC, because that is what I feel like was most fun. When you get custom items that is when it takes away from the RSC feel and ruins pking.

As far as adding more stuff to the game… that could be a place to venture down, but i dont think new wearable items should be made because it ruins the game Runescape.

Read full topic
